column4: if you have a server which is located at file://localhost that means that it's supposed to be your computer isn't it?
well, my computer only has a HD of 300gb, but this is server has like over 900GBs of space, how is that possible?
I'm not actually on ubuntu, I just thought you guys might know something about this, so sorry if I'm wasting your time, but I thought this was pretty damn strange
Do you know what might cause this?
